Counter Strike is a game that is easy to get in to but has a high skill ceiling: that means the best players are very, very, good. You can work on your skills through practice, and play with friends in a team to improve your ranking and improve your game experience.

Or that's how it used to be for many years.

Every game has cheaters, but it was rare to meet them in CSGO matches. Those who did cheat were very obvious, and soon after reporting them, you would get notifications that they had been banned.

However since the game went free-to-play a few years ago, the gameplay experience has become terrible. Cheating is rampant, and done in a semi-legit manner with the cheaters playing very deceptively to try and trick the Overwatch system and other players. Reporting has no effect.

The game was a lot of fun but given the cheating epidemic it is better not to take it seriously. Play something else instead if you want to try and hone your skills. Doing so in this game will only be a waste of time.

сап двач играю в эту помойку 4 года с большими перерывами. единственный недостаток что все обращают внимание что у меня между ног нет детородного мужского органа и начинают проситься в зяти моей маме. если играть с тимплеем то получается лампово, если играть с молчаливыми додиками или токсиками то хочется самой нырнуть в канаву к их мамам. всех обняла приподняла.
